1440090.name: Viewergames Racing
1440090.description:
This is a small racing game specifically tailored for Twitch Streamers.
As a streamer, you fire up the game and your viewers can immediately join in without any additional downloads.

Many of Twitch's integration features are supported:
  • A Twitch Extension for convenient controlling and interaction of viewers directly from the channel page - Manage car layouts, fire items, unleash chaos!
  • Use Channel Points for even more chaos and fancy stuff
  • Allows use of Twitch Bits to support the streamer and the developers <3
  • Unlock cars & skins
  • Ranking & Seasons
